_label: Calligraphy: A Page of Text from Sadi's Bustan (verso)

identified_by.content: Calligraphy: A Page of Text from Sadi's Bustan (verso)

referred_to_by.content: Sir Charles Forbes, 7th Baronet [1773-1849], Bengal, London, and Scotland, by descent to his great-grandson, Colonel Sir John Forbes (?-1849); Colonel Sir John Stewart Forbes [1901-1984], Baronet, DSO, DL, Allargue House, Strathdon, Aberdeenshire, Scotland, UK, consigned to Sotheby's London for sale (?-1962); (Sotheby’s, London, Western and Oriental Manuscripts and Miniatures, 10 December 1962, lot 9, sold to Ralph Benkaim) (10 December 1962); Ralph Benkaim [1914-2001]  and Catherine Glynn Benkaim [b. 1946], Beverly Hills, CA, sold to the Cleveland Museum of Art (1962-2013); The Cleveland Museum of Art, Cleveland, OH (2013-)
